pkgmetadata.longdescription: Decorator for flup's gzip compression WSGI middleware=====================================================Usage example:: from wsgigzip import gzip @gzip() def index(environ, start_response): start_response('200 OK', [('Content-type', 'text/plain')]) return ['Home Page'] if __name__ == '__main__': from wsgiref.simple_server import make_server http = make_server('', 8080, index) http.serve_forever()
